features: Important: Watch the video and learn the”Designed for" details listed below!
Designed for concrete, brick and wood studs wall (single stud).
Designed for TVs up to 80 lbs (36.3 KG) and display sized 22" - 55" (66 CM - 140 CM).
Designed for VESA sized from 100x100 MM through 400x400 MM.
Comfortable View with tilt range from +10° to -5°.
Articulating up range from 2.6" to 16.3" ; 180° swivel.
Mounting hardware, bubble level, mounting template and User manual included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics TV Wall Mounts Flat Panel TV Wall Mount Designed to mount and move TVs securely from a wall, the brackets support flat panel TVs and include hardware and instructions for easy installation. Dynamic Viewing The wall mounts add dynamic viewing to any room with adjustable tilt, swivel and extension features. Multiple styles available for your viewing needs. Adjustable Positioning Single, dual and triple arm wall mounts extend from the wall to suit your space, and are designed to mount securely into wood wall studs. Durable Construction Made of heavy-duty aluminum and powder-coated steel with included metal hardware and bubble level for secure, accurate positioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for my Amazon Fire 50 inch TV
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was a great TV mount for my new Fire TV 50 inch. My wife always wanted our TV mounted on the wall so that she could swivel it outward and watch it in the kitchen while she's cooking. This mount allows for just that.I recommend watching a video or two online to get a basic idea of how to install this thing. The instructions are pretty basic - just pictures - and if you have never done this before, just pictures isn't enough (at least not for me). I took off one star for that. Fortunately the VESA mounting system works for all VESA compatible TVs/Monitors. There are a LOT of options of course, and figuring out which one works for your TV is the only real hard part.The package includes a dizzying array of hardware to accommodate all the various VESA configurations. It also includes drywall expanders in case you can't find a stud - which I think is crazy! I STRONGLY recommend you DO NOT use these and mount this directly to a 2x4 in your wall! Once mounted on a 2x4, you can feel how solid and strong the hold is on this mount. I think drywall expanders would be dicey at best to hold the TV safely.To adjust the horizontal direction or to pull the TV out further from the wall is simple and easy. The motion is smooth and easy to do. Adjusting the TILT is not so easy and requires you to loosen two nuts behind the TV. That is the ONLY thing that is even remotely annoying about the operation of this mount. Though I really don't know if any other TV mount would allow for an easier tilt adjustment. Fortunately, I'm happy to set a slight downward tilt and don't foresee adjusting that at all.The mount has a good range of motion and can almost allow you to turn the TV at a 45 degree angle - almost - but not quite. I'd say it's more like a 30 degree rotation. But that's pretty good for today's wide screen TV's!Overall I think this is an excellent value and works perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for mounting any TV
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics Full Motion Articulating TV Monitor Wall Mount has become a staple in all of our short-term rentals, particularly for Amazon TVs. Its versatility and compatibility with TVs ranging from 26" to 55" make it a must-have for any space. The ease of installation and the full motion articulation allow for optimal positioning, ensuring that guests can enjoy their favorite shows and movies from any angle in the room. The sleek black design adds a modern touch, complementing the overall aesthetics of the space. With a sturdy build capable of supporting panels up to 80 lbs, this wall mount provides a secure and space-saving solution. It's a practical investment that not only enhances the viewing experience for our guests but also adds a touch of sophistication to the room's layout. Overall, the Amazon Basics TV wall mount is a reliable and essential accessory for our short-term rental properties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Perfect for our 50 inch Vizio
reviews.reviewText: We used this mount for our ~40lbs 50" LCD. I went a bit bigger on the mount out of precaution. I was initially worried that the mount would not fit the TV, as it is on the older side. This mount can adapt to ANYTHING. The instrux were very helpful. It was not plug and play to install, but we got it done. you *must* have studs to which to mount it. Super quality material (solid metal). Range of motion is awesome. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality & easy install - only lacking range of motion
reviews.reviewText: It's sturdy and well-constructed, ensuring a secure hold for my TV. However, the only area that could be improved is the range of motion in terms of how far the TV can be turned. While it's a minor limitation, the mount's inability to swivel or tilt as much as expected might be a drawback for those seeking more adjustability. Overall, it's a reliable and durable mount that secures the TV well, but it could benefit from greater flexibility in movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best TV Mount!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best TV mount I have use so far. It is not only strongly made, easy to install, articulates very well, but the price was perfect. Dismount comes with every screw, nut, bolt, washer, and mounting template that you will possibly need. It accommodates a large range of TV sizes. Not only does it adjust the left or right, but you can angle it down. When it is folded against the wall, you can’t even see the mount. I highly recommend this TV mount!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for tv
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics Full Motion Articulating TV Monitor Wall Mount is a stellar solution for optimizing space and enhancing viewing flexibility. Designed for 26" to 55" TVs and flat panels up to 80 lbs, this wall mount offers a robust and reliable solution for a variety of setups.The full-motion articulation ensures an array of viewing angles, allowing for tilt, swivel, and extension to achieve the perfect positioning. The build quality is sturdy, instilling confidence that your TV or monitor is securely mounted.Installation is straightforward, aided by clear instructions and included hardware. The sleek black finish adds a touch of sophistication to the setup.Overall, the Amazon Basics Wall Mount combines functionality, durability, and affordability, making it a top-notch choice for anyone looking to maximize their viewing experience and save space. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Great product. I was surprised how easy it was to install. I have installed a few different types before but this one was a breeze. It has 3 large bolts that go into the same stud vertically. It is sturdy and it comes with many options for different TV sizes and makes. It took a second to find the right combination of hardware but it fit perfectly and works great. Just 3 bolts in the wall, attach the plate to the back of the TV, then 2 small screws to secure the TV to the arm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and smooth artic ulation
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount was eaasy enough to install but not for every do it your selfer as you need to know somethingabout installing heavy objects to a wall. I think the arm movement is very adequate to bring the TV away from thewall when needed and gettng the TV to be aligned correctly was also well designed. Maybe there are better mounts but for the money this is a great value and I am sure it wll last.
Very well made 👏 I'm very impressed for the price and very easy for my hubby to do alone as I can not help much by lifting. Slides right on!
Buenos materiales, es acero puro, con muchas opciones para diferentes formas de pantallas, con un instructivo bastante claro y fácil de seguir
Fácil de instalar, buena calidad, se siente muy resistente a comparación de otros y se puede mover la pantalla con facilidad, le puse una pantalla Hisense de 55 pulgadas y quedó bastante bien!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent value and very sturdy, great buy.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent value, easy to install and very sturdy

reviews.reviewTitle: The best I could find. Perfect
reviews.reviewText: Man this bracket has and does it all.Strong, stable and the extended range of motion was a must have for me. Very well designed and build quality is evident.My 55" 46 pound tv is perfectly stable and I can swing out the set to almost 90° from the wall.Also like that the wall mounted base frame is finished with rounded corner caps. Nice touch. Thoughtful.
